attributes.action: STOP FOREIGNERS COMING TO THE UK FOR FREE HEALTH CARE
attributes.additional_details: At present the British taxpayer is paying for foreigners to come to this country for free Health care on the NHS ,why are the Government allowing this to happen? ,why should we have to pay for the Health care for the rest of the world?, & now the NHS management says that it is their Human right to receive treatment !,what about our HUMAN RIGHT not to pay for it?,
